summary: Builder class that assembles a configuration object for an encoder‑decoder classification model, offering fluent setters for hyperparameters such as dropout, task type, label set, repetition count, sample rate, separable layers, and timesteps, and finalizes the configuration for use in training or inference.
business_intent: Provide a convenient, programmatic way for data scientists and engineers to define and generate model configuration settings for classification (including regression) tasks, streamlining model setup in machine‑learning pipelines.
